header.title: Legal Search
header.description: Ask any questions and get penal code and caselaw citations in a single response.

accuracyNotice.title: Accuracy Notice
accuracyNotice.description: This assistant can make mistakes. Always confirm the cited penal code and caselaw before acting on the information provided.

intro.title: Legal Search Assistant
intro.description: Describe a situation or ask about a statute. I will provide a short explanation and cite relevant penal code charges or caselaw so you can dig deeper instantly.

bullets.penalCode: Find matching San Andreas Penal Code charges.
bullets.caselaw: Surface local caselaw summaries and implications.
bullets.oyez: Link out to similar Oyez cases for further reading.

results.noPenalCode: No penal code charges were identified for this query.
results.noCaselaw: No local caselaw directly matched this question.

legalSearch.inputPlaceholder: Ask about a charge, caselaw, or legal scenario...

errors.overloaded: The model is currently overloaded. Please try your search again in a moment.
errors.generic: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.

header.title: Dashboard
header.description: Welcome to MDC Panel+. Here are your available tools.

arrestCalculator.title: Arrest Calculator
arrestCalculator.description: Calculate arrest sentences based on charges.

penalCode.title: Simplified Penal Code
penalCode.description: Browse a simplified version of the penal code.

caselaw.title: Caselaw & Legal Resources
caselaw.description: Access caselaw and other legal resources.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your application settings and data.

header.title: About MDC Panel+
header.description: A passion project designed to help.

overview.title: What's this all about?
paragraphs: Hello! I'm a solo developer who created this tool out of a genuine desire to assist our roleplay community's law enforcement officers. My goal was simple: make the paperwork and resource-gathering aspects of the job a little easier and more efficient.

This project is a labor of love, built to streamline daily tasks and provide a centralized hub for essential LEO tools. Whether you're calculating a sentence, writing a report, or looking up a piece of caselaw, I hope this panel makes your experience smoother.

tech.title: Technical Tidbits
tech.description: A brief look under the hood.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This entire project is open-source. You can view the code, suggest changes, or even contribute yourself over at the {link}.

ai.title: AI-Assisted Development
ai.description: To accelerate development and explore modern coding practices, this application was built with the assistance of AI, specifically Google's Firebase Studio.

siteVersion.label: Site Version
siteVersion.tooltip: The current public version of the application.

cacheVersion.label: Cache Version
cacheVersion.tooltip: Controls browser cache; changes on major updates to force-fetch new assets.

localStorageVersion.label: Local Storage Version
localStorageVersion.tooltip: Controls local data; changes on major updates to clear outdated settings.

cdn.label: CDN
cdn.tooltip: The base URL from which static assets like penal codes are served.

github.label: GitHub Repository
github.tooltip: The public source code for this project.

discord.label: Discord Community
discord.tooltip: The official community and support server.

support.title: Support & Donations
support.description: Your support is appreciated, but let's share the love.
support.intro: While I truly appreciate any thought of a donation, I'd first encourage you to support the platforms and people who made this project possible. Please consider donating to {gtaWorld} for keeping our community running, or to the original creator of the MDC Panel, {founder}, whose foundation I built upon.

contact.title: Contact & Feedback
contact.description: The current maintainer is {maintainer}. If you have any questions, find a bug, or have a suggestion, please feel free to reach out via Discord or use the feedback form available on the site.

header.title: Help & Feedback Center
header.description: Find answers to common questions and get support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.empty: No questions found matching your search.

cta.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
cta.description: I'm always happy to collect feedback.

policyNotice.title: Policy Notice
policyNotice.description: LSPD policy requires the use of the advanced arrest report format.

textareaWithPreset.clearToReenable: Clear the textarea to re-enable presets.
textareaWithPreset.textareaInGroupError: textarea-with-preset cannot be used inside an input group.

header.title: Arrest Calculator
header.description: Calculate arrest sentences based on charges.

placeholders.searchCharge: Search charge by name or ID...

depaWarning.title: Heads up!
depaWarning.description: Please ensure you select the correct Category for drug charges. Check the warrant (if applicable) for more information.

noCharges.title: No Charges
noCharges.description: Please add at least one charge.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Charge
incomplete.selectCharge: Please select a charge for all rows.
incomplete.selectCategory: Please select a category for the drug charge "{charge}".

sentence.title: Sentence capped
sentence.description: The total sentence exceeds the maximum of {maxDays} days. The displayed time has been capped.

impound.title: Impound capped
impound.description: The total impound duration exceeds the maximum of {maxDays} days. Displayed value: {value}.

suspension.title: Suspension capped
suspension.description: The total suspension duration exceeds the maximum of {maxDays} days. Displayed value: {value}.

header.title: Arrest Report
header.descriptionWithReport: A summary of the calculated charges and report form.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This tool is to provide you assistance with your paperwork, the quality of your writing is your responsibility. You are still expected to provide truthful and detailed information.

noCharges.title: No Charges Selected
noCharges.description: You must first select charges from the Arrest Calculator before you can create a report.

narrative.label: Arrest Narrative
narrative.description: Describe the events leading up to the arrest in first person and in chronological order, ensure you explain your probable cause of each of the charges and the arrest.

supportingEvidence.label: Supporting Evidence
supportingEvidence.placeholder: Videos, Photographs, Links, Audio Recordings / Transcripts, Witness Statements & Testimony
supportingEvidence.description: Provide supporting evidence to aid the arrest report.

dashcam.label: Dashboard Camera
dashcam.placeholder: The dashboard camera captures audio and video footage showcasing...

description.main: Roleplay what the dashboard camera captures OR provide Streamable/YouTube links.
description.warning: (( Lying in this section will lead to OOC punishment ))

evaded.label: Evaded
evaded.text: When attempting to detain {{suspect}}, they fled in a vehicle leading to a pursuit by the department.

resistedArrest.label: Resisted Arrest
resistedArrest.text: When attempting to apprehend {{suspect}}, the suspect physically resisted detainment and attempted to flee from the peace officers involved in the arrest.

searched.label: Searched
searched.text: {{suspect}} was positioned in front of a department vehicle's dashcam and searched in accordance to the legal requirements as well as department's policy as well as the training I've undergone, the following items have been found in the posession of the suspect:

booking.label: Booking
booking.text: I transported {{suspect}} to the nearest department's station, where I booked them for the charges mentioned within this report according to all outlined departmental guidelines, state requirements and training.

narrative.base: On the {date}, I {rank} {name} (#{badge}) of the {department} while under the callsign {callsign} conducted an arrest on {suspect}. At approximately {time} hours, I was driving on {street} when I

source.title: SOURCE OF ACTIVITY
source.placeholder: Describe the source of the activity...

photographs.title: PHOTOGRAPHS, VIDEOS, IN-CAR VIDEO (DICV), and DIGITAL IMAGING
photographs.noVideoPlaceholder: (( You may use this section if you don't have a video recording of what happened. Describe what the dashcam would capture. If you have a video, select 'Video?' in the Arrest Report Modifiers. Lying in this section will lead to OOC punishments. ))

narrative.clearToReenable: Clear the textarea to re-enable presets.

source.withPartners: On {date}, I, {rank} {name} (#{badge}), assigned to {divDetail}, partnered with {partners}, were deployed under Unit {callsign}.
source.singleOfficer: On {date}, I, {rank} {name} (#{badge}), assigned to {divDetail}, was deployed under Unit {callsign}.
source.vehicleMarkedSlicktop: I was driving a marked black and white slicktop.
source.vehicleMarkedLightbar: I was driving a marked black and white with a rooftop light bar.
source.vehicleUnmarked: I was driving an unmarked vehicle.
source.uniformWithBadge: I was wearing my department-issued {uniform} uniform and was openly displaying my badge of office on my uniform.
source.patrolUniform: I was wearing my department-issued patrol uniform and was openly displaying my badge of office on my uniform.
source.plainClothesBadge: I was wearing plain clothes and was openly displaying my badge.

investigation.vehicleObserved: At approximately {time} hours, I was driving on {street} when I observed a {color} {model}, {plate}.
investigation.onPatrol: At approximately {time} hours, I was driving on {street}.

arrest.miranda:
I admonished {suspectName} utilizing my {notebookType}, reading the following, verbatim:
“You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say may be used against you in a court of law. You have the right to the presence of an attorney during any questioning. If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be appointed to you, free of charge, before any questioning, if you want. Do you understand?”
{suspectName} responded {understood}.
arrest.searched: {suspectName} was searched in front of a police vehicle, which was covered by the vehicle's Digital In-Car Video (DICV).

photographs.dicv: My Digital In-Car Video (DICV) was activated during this investigation - {link}
photographs.photos: I took photographs using my Department-issued cell phone - {link}
photographs.thirdParty: I obtained third party video footage - {link}

booking.biometricsOnFile: {suspectName}'s full biometrics, including fingerprints and DNA, were already on file, streamlining the booking process.
booking.booked: {booker} booked {suspectName} on all of the charges listed under the ARREST sub-heading.
booking.fingerprints: During booking, {booker} took 10 fingerprint samples from {suspectName} and entered them into the Automated Fingerprint Identification System (AFIS).
booking.dna: As {suspectName} was booked on a felony charge, {booker} took a Bode SecurSwab 2 Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) profile from him.
booking.codis: {booker} submitted this profile to the Combined DNA Index System (CODIS).

propertyRoom.lspd: the Mission Row Station property room

court.primary: I, {rank} {name} #{badge}, can testify to the contents of this report.
court.additional: {rank} {name} #{badge} can also testify to the contents of this report.
